Package gameClient

Class MyAgent

java.lang.Object
gameClient.MyAgent
public class MyAgent
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an agent in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MyAgent​(directed_weighted_graph g, int start_node)
    Constructor for this class, initializes this graph and start node.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    edge_data get_curr_edge()
    This method returns the edge on which this agent is currently chasing located on.
    MyPokemon get_curr_fruit()
    This method returns the current pokemon this agent is chasing.
    long get_sg_dt()
    This method returns the time in milliseconds until this agent reaches the pokemon he's chasing.
    int getDest()
    This method returns the agent's current destination node key.
    int getID()
    This method returns this agent's ID.
    geo_location getLocation()
    This method returns this agent's location.
    java.util.List<node_data> getPath()
    This method returns a list of nodes of the shortest path between this agent the pokemon he's chasing.
    double getSpeed()
    This method returns this agent's current speed.
    int getSrc()
    This method returns the agent's current source node key.
    long getTimeForNext()
    This method returns the time in milliseconds the until this agent reaches it's next destination node.
    double getValue()
    This method returns this agent's current value.
    void set_curr_edge​(edge_data _curr_edge)
    This method allows changing this instance _curr_edge object to the received edge object.
    void set_curr_fruit​(MyPokemon curr_fruit)
    This method allows changing the pokemon this agent is currently chasing to the received curr_fruit.
    void set_gg​(directed_weighted_graph _gg)
    This method allows changing this instance _gg object to the received graph object.
    void set_pos​(geo_location _pos)
    This method allows changing this instance _pos object to the received _pos object.
    void set_sg_dt​(long _sg_dt)
    This method allows changing this agent's _sg_dt parameter to the received _sg_dt value.
    void set_value​(double _value)
    This method allows changing this instance _value object to the received value object.
    void setCurrNode​(int src)
    This method allows changing this currNode to the received src node.
    void setDest​(int dest)
    This method allows changing this instance dest object to the received dest object.
    boolean setNextNode​(int dest)
    This method returns true iff there is an edge between current this src node to the received dest in this graph.
    void setPath​(java.util.List<node_data> path)
    This method allows changing this instance path object to the received path.
    void setSpeed​(double v)
    This method allows changing this speed object to the received v value.
    void setSrc​(int src)
    This method allows changing this instance src object to the received src object.
    void setTimeForNext​(long timeForNext)
    This method allows changing this instance timeForNext object to the received long object.
    java.lang.String toString()
    This method returns a string representing this agent instance in a json format.
    void update​(java.lang.String json)
    This method allows updating all of this instance parameters according to another agent values represented as a json String.
